m0_error: Discrepancy in 'MRAcquisitionType' for ASL file 'sub-Sub103_asl.json' and M0 file 'sub-Sub103_m0scan.json': ASL value = 2D, M0 value = 3D
Discrepancy in 'PulseSequenceType' for ASL file 'sub-Sub103_asl.json' and M0 file 'sub-Sub103_m0scan.json': ASL value = EPI, M0 value = 3Dgrase

basic_report: ASL was acquired on a 3T Siemens Prisma_fit scanner using single-PLD PCASL labeling and a 2D EPI readout with the following parameters: TE = 14ms, TR = 2540ms, flip angle 90 degrees, in-plane resolution 3x3mm2, 28 slices with 5mm thickness, labeling duration 1508.8ms, PLD 200ms, without background suppression. In total, 8 control-label pairs were acquired. There is inconsistency in MRAcquisitionType, PulseSequenceType between M0 and ASL scans.
extended_report: ASL was acquired on a 3T Siemens Prisma_fit scanner using single-PLD PCASL labeling and a 2D EPI readout with the following parameters: TE = 14ms, TR = 2540ms, flip angle 90 degrees, in-plane resolution 3x3mm2, 28 slices with 5mm thickness, labeling duration 1508.8ms, PLD 200ms, without background suppression. In total, 8 control-label pairs were acquired. PCASL labeling was applied with the following pulse parameters: average pulse gradient 0.6mT/m. There is inconsistency in MRAcquisitionType, PulseSequenceType between M0 and ASL scans.
m0_concise_error:
MRAcquisitionType (M0): Discrepancy between ASL JSON and M0 JSON
